Package Backend.DataTypes

Class Festival

java.lang.Object
Backend.DataTypes.Festival
public class Festival extends Object
This is the main data type class This class is responsible with creating and handling data types and their interactions with other packages

  • Constructor Details

    • Festival

      public Festival(String name, String place, LocalDate startDate, int duration)
      Class Constructor. This will create a festival with organizators and events
      Parameters:
      name - name of the festival
      place - the location of the festival
      startDate - festivals start date
      duration - total duration of the festival in days Constructor also creates an end date for the festival with help of duration and start date.

  • Method Details

    • addStandardEvent

      public boolean addStandardEvent(String name, LocalDateTime date, String description, int duration)
      This method create and a standard event in to event list Also Notify organizators if event added successfully
      Parameters:
      name - name for StandardEvent
      date - event date for StandardEvent
      description - a small description for StandardEvent
      duration - event duration in hours for StandardEvent
      Returns:
      on success true, on failure false

    • addPerformanceEvent

      public boolean addPerformanceEvent(String name, LocalDateTime date, String description, int duration, ArrayList<String> performers)
      crate and add a performance event to event list Also Notify organizators if event added successfully
      Parameters:
      name - name for PerformanceEvent
      date - event date for PerformanceEvent
      description - a small description for PerformanceEvent
      duration - event duration in hours for PerformanceEvent
      performers - attended performer list for PerformanceEvent
      Returns:
      on success true, on failure false

    • appendPerformerToPerformanceEvent

      public boolean appendPerformerToPerformanceEvent(String eventName, LocalDateTime eventDate, String performerName)
      Append a performer to already existing event
      Parameters:
      eventName - name of the event you want to edit
      eventDate - date of the event you want to edit
      performerName - name of the new performer
      Returns:
      on success true, on failure false

    • addOrganizator

      public boolean addOrganizator(String name, String lastName, String email, String phoneNumber)
      Add a new organizator to festival if not already exist
      Parameters:
      name - first and middle name for organizator
      lastName - surname for organizator
      email - email address for organizator
      phoneNumber - phone number for organizator
      Returns:
      on success true, on failure false
